preInfo.title: Starting level test
preInfo.description: Complete the 6 parts of the starting level test to get your personalised English program.

postInfo.title: #FIRST_NAME#'s program
postInfo.description: We will finish personalizing your program based on the results of your test. Once you complete all the sections, you will be able to access your first week of practice.

endInfo.title: #FIRST_NAME#'s program
endInfo.description: We will finish personalizing your program based on the results of your test. You can now access the first week of practice in your program!

startingLevelItems.title: Welcome #FIRST_NAME#
startingLevelItems.description:
Welcome to your test!

Based on your answers to our questionnaire, we have created a starting level test for you.

How are you feeling right now?

options.description: Not yet sure what to expect

startingLevelItems.title: Starting level test
startingLevelItems.description:
This test consists of [strong]6 parts[/strong] and it will take you [strong]10 minutes[/strong] to complete each one of them.

We will use your results to optimize your prersonalized English program.

startingLevelItems.title: Objective
startingLevelItems.description:
The purpose of the test is to confirm your current level in English and to better understand your problem areas.

The test is divided into 6 parts, we recommend you to complete three parts [strong]today[/strong] and three [strong]tomorrow.[/strong]

startingLevelItems.title: The six skills
startingLevelItems.description: To assess your level comprehensively, we’ll test each of these skills separately:#SKILL_LIST#

startingLevelItems.title: Exercises
startingLevelItems.description:
We’ll first use interactive exercises to assess your vocabulary and grammar.

Then, we will evaluate your Reading, Writing, Listening and Speaking skills with exercises inspired by real-life situations.

startingLevelItems.title: Levels of difficulty
startingLevelItems.description:
We’ll start each test with easier exercises, then we’ll increase the level of difficulty step by step.

If you don’t know the answer to an exercise, you can click the skip button in the upper right corner:#SKIP_IMG#

startingLevelItems.title: Confirming your level
startingLevelItems.description:
Our learning technology tracks how you are doing in the test. Moreover, we’ll take small pauses to ask you about [strong]your experience[/strong] with the exercises.

We’ll use this information to decide whether we should increase the level of difficulty or [strong]if we should exchange into a different type of exercise.[/strong]

startingLevelItems.title: Let's get started!
startingLevelItems.description: Please, complete the test at a pace you find comfortable and to the best of your capability.

startingLevelItems.title: Part 1 - Vocabulary
startingLevelItems.description:
You’ll be first recognising some words and later writing them.

We’ll start with some easy words to confirm if you already know them. After that, we’ll advance step by step towards words that are new to you.

startingLevelItems.title: #SHORT_SECTION_FAMILIAR_TITLE_RULE#
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems you were familiar with most words in the previous exercises.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of the words were new to me

startingLevelItems.title: ¡Estupendo!
startingLevelItems.description: Let's take a step towards more challenging words then.

startingLevelItems.title: Thank you for sharing
startingLevelItems.description: Let's then move to an exercise where the [strong]words are a bit easier but you'll be writing them.[/strong] This allows us to confirm your level in vocabulary.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description: Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be [strong]writing words.[/strong] This allows us to confirm your level in vocabulary.

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems most of the words in the previous exercises were new to you.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I was familiar with most of the words

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description: Let's then move to an exercise where the [strong]words are a bit easier but you'll be writing them.[/strong] This allows us to confirm your level in vocabulary.

startingLevelItems.title: Excellent
startingLevelItems.description: Let's try a set of more challenging words then.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description: Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be [strong]writing words.[/strong] This allows us to confirm your level in vocabulary.

startingLevelItems.title: You've done a great job, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems that you were familiar with most of the words in the previous exercises.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of the words were new to me

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems that most of the words in the previous exercises were new to you.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I was familiar with most of the words

startingLevelItems.title: ¡Gracias #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
You have now completed the vocabulary test.

Let's take a look at the results!

startingLevelItems.title: Your level in vocabulary
startingLevelItems.description:
Based on the test, your starting level in vocabulary is:

#VOCABULARY_STARTING_LEVEL#

We'll finalize your personalized program once we confirm the level you have in the other 5 skill areas.

startingLevelItems.title: Next up: grammar
startingLevelItems.description:
Keep up the great work in [strong]part 2 - grammar.[/strong]

After that things willl get even more exciting as we move to test your real-life English skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Part 2 - Grammar
startingLevelItems.description:
We are going to test your grammar level. To do this, complete the following sentences and then some short texts.

We will start with easy exercises and then we will increase the difficulty.

startingLevelItems.title: #SHORT_SECTION_FAMILIAR_TITLE_RULE#
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems you were familiar with most of the grammar needed in the previous exercises.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of the exercises were challenging for me

startingLevelItems.title: Great!
startingLevelItems.description: Let's take a step towards more challenging grammar then.

startingLevelItems.title: Thank you for sharing
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where the needed grammar is a bit more simple.

This time, you'll be filling in the gaps to short texts. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your level in grammar.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description: Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be filling in the gaps to short texts. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your level in grammar.

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems most of the previous grammar exercises were challenging for you.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I was familiar with most of the grammar

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where the level of difficulty is a bit easier.

This time, you'll be filling in the gaps to short texts. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your level in grammar.

startingLevelItems.title: Excellent
startingLevelItems.description: Let's try a set of more challenging grammar exercises then.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description: Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be filling in the gaps to short texts. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your level in grammar.

startingLevelItems.title: Well done, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems you were familiar with most of the grammar needed in the previous exercises.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of the exercises were challenging for me

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems most of the previous grammar exercises were challenging for you.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I was familiar with most of the grammar

startingLevelItems.title: Thank you, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
You have now completed the grammar test.

Let's take a look at the results!

startingLevelItems.title: Your level in grammar
startingLevelItems.description:
Based on the test, your starting level in grammar is:

#GRAMMAR_STARTING_LEVEL#

We'll finalize your personalized program based on your confirmed starting level in grammar and in the other skill areas. We'll teach you what you need to learn to achieve an advanced level in English.

startingLevelItems.title: Next up: reading
startingLevelItems.description:
You have been performing really well today, #FIRST_NAME#.

Next, we'll start to test your communication skills in English, reading being the first of them.

That will be the final test part for today.

startingLevelItems.title: Part 3 - Reading
startingLevelItems.description:
Please complete the following sentences using their context. We'll start with easier to more difficult sentences.

Then, you'll have to [strong]read a text[/strong] and answer some questions.

startingLevelItems.title: #SHORT_SECTION_FAMILIAR_TITLE_RULE#
startingLevelItems.description:
It seemed to be easy for you to understand most of the sentences.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of the sentences were a bit unclear to me

startingLevelItems.title: Great!
startingLevelItems.description: In that case, we will give you more challenging sentences.

startingLevelItems.title: Thank you for sharing
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where the level is a bit easier.

In this case, you'll be [strong]reading a text and answering questions[/strong] related to its content. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your reading skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be [strong]reading a text and answering questions[/strong] related to its content.

This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your reading skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems the meaning of most of those sentences was a bit unclear to you.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I understood most of the sentences completely

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where the level is a bit easier.

In this case, you'll be [strong]reading a text and answering questions[/strong] related to its content. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your reading skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Excellent
startingLevelItems.description: Let's try a set of more challenging sentences then.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be [strong]reading a text and answering questions[/strong] related to its content.

This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your reading skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Great job, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems that you were able to understand most of the text.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of the text was a bit unclear to me

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems that you had difficulties understanding the text.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I understood most of the text completely

startingLevelItems.title: Thank you, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
You have now completed the reading test.

Let's take a look at the results!

startingLevelItems.title: Your level in reading
startingLevelItems.description:
Based on the test, your level in reading is:

#READING_STARTING_LEVEL#

You have done a great job today. We can see you really have what it takes to achieve an advanced level in English.

options.description: Did I complete the first test day already?

startingLevelItems.title: Day 1 completed!
startingLevelItems.description:
Great job! You have finished the parts of the test corresponding to your first day. You have progressed a lot and deserve a break.

Tomorrow you will be able to continue with the remaining 3 parts of the test. After that, we will take you to your first week of practice.

How does that sound, #FIRST_NAME#?

options.description: I would like to do more today

startingLevelItems.title: We look forward to it
startingLevelItems.description:
But we don't want you to forget about your goal. We want to help you achieve it.

[strong]Would you like us to remind you tomorrow to complete your starting level test?[/strong]

startingLevelItems.title: All set!
startingLevelItems.description:
We will continue tomorrow by testing your [strong]writing, listening and speaking[/strong] skills.

The speaking part includes our state of the art pronunciation detecting technology. We are waiting a lot to show it to you!

You can now close the app and open it again tomorrow to complete the rest of the test.

startingLevelItems.title: If you want, you can continue the test
startingLevelItems.description:
If you want to make tomorrow easier for yourself, you can already complete [strong]the writing test[/strong] today and leave the rest for tomorrow.

And we won't stop you from doing even more if you want to.

However, please try to keep the amount of time you plan to devote to studying English on a level [strong]you can keep up with in the long term.[/strong] It's a common mistake to start too intensively and end up getting fed up soon after. So let's be smart about this!

startingLevelItems.title: Remember your goal
startingLevelItems.description: Before continuing we wanted to ask you: Would you like us to remind you tomorrow to complete the rest of the test?

startingLevelItems.title: All set!
startingLevelItems.description: You can now continue to test part 4 - [strong]writing.[/strong]

startingLevelItems.title: Part 4 - Writing
startingLevelItems.description:
In this part we are going to evaluate your writing. To do this, [strong]you must write a short text in English.[/strong]

When you write the text, pay attention to:

- the grammar and spelling
- the topic that is asked
- that the text is coherent

startingLevelItems.title: Text received!
startingLevelItems.description: Before checking your results, we’d like to know how you felt about your performance in this exercise, #FIRST_NAME#.

options.description: It felt too difficult to me

startingLevelItems.title: Your level in writing
startingLevelItems.description:
Based on the test, your starting level in writing is:

#WRITING_STARTING_LEVEL#

Knowing your starting level in all skill areas allows us to teach you what you need to learn to achieve an advanced level in English.

startingLevelItems.title: Next up: listening
startingLevelItems.description:
You only have [strong]2 parts[/strong] left to complete your test and go to the first practice week!

Next, we will test your listening comprehension skills. Shall we continue?

startingLevelItems.title: Part 5 - Listening
startingLevelItems.description:
In the first listening exercises you will have to choose the word you hear. Then, you will have to choose the correct phrase to answer some audios.

To finish, we will ask you to listen to a longer audio and then answer some questions.

startingLevelItems.title: #SHORT_SECTION_FAMILIAR_TITLE_RULE#
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems to have been easy for you to understand most of what was being said in the previous exercises.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I had difficulties understanding what was being said

startingLevelItems.title: Great!
startingLevelItems.description: Let's take a step towards more challenging recordings then.

startingLevelItems.title: Thank you for sharing
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where the level is a bit easier.

Next, you'll be listening to a [strong]longer audio clip[/strong] and [strong]answering questions[/strong] based on it. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your listening skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be listening to a [strong]longer audio clip[/strong] and [strong]answering questions[/strong] based on it.

This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your listening skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems to have been difficult for you to understand what was said in the previous exercises.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of what was said was clear to me

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where the level is a bit easier.

Next, you'll be listening to a [strong]longer audio clip[/strong] and [strong]answering questions[/strong] based on it. This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your listening skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Excellent
startingLevelItems.description: Let's try a set of more challenging recordings then.

startingLevelItems.title: Alright
startingLevelItems.description:
Let's then move to an exercise where you'll be listening to a [strong]longer audio clip[/strong] and [strong]answering questions[/strong] based on it.

This allows us to get a more comprehensive idea of your listening skills.

startingLevelItems.title: Excellent, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems to have been easy for you to understand what was being said in the previous exercise.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, I had difficulties understanding what was being said

startingLevelItems.title: Improvement area discovered
startingLevelItems.description:
It seems to have been difficult for you to understand what was said in the previous exercise.

Would you agree?

options.description: No, most of what was said was clear to me

startingLevelItems.title: Thank you, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
You have now completed the listening test.

Let's take a look at the results!

startingLevelItems.title: Your level in listening
startingLevelItems.description:
Based on the test, your starting level in listening is:

#LISTENING_STARTING_LEVEL#

You are doing so well! We can tell that you'll be advancing very fast once we get started with your personalized program.

startingLevelItems.title: Next up: speaking
startingLevelItems.description: Alright, just [strong]one more test part[/strong] to complete before we can finalize your program. And it will be an exciting one. It's time to speak!

startingLevelItems.title: Microphone access
startingLevelItems.description: Please, allow access to the microphone to do the Speaking test.

startingLevelItems.title: Part 6 - Speaking
startingLevelItems.description:
¡It's time to speak! We will first test your [strong]pronunciation skills[/strong] on nine English sounds that are the most difficult ones for native Spanish speakers.

After that, we will test your [strong]communication skills[/strong] with three short dialogues in English.

startingLevelItems.title: Pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
In these next exercises we'll use our [strong]pronunciation detecting technology[/strong] while having you say certain words and short sentences aloud.

We'll start with the sounds [blue]z[/blue] and [blue]∫[/blue]. They are typically spelled as [black]s[/black] and [black]sh[/black], respectively.

startingLevelItems.title: Your pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
Thank you for the input #FIRST_NAME#! Here are your results:

#Z_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4##ʃ_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4#
Next, let’s try the sounds [black]p[/black], [black]t[/black] and [black]k[/black].

startingLevelItems.title: Your pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
Thank you for the input #FIRST_NAME#! Here are your results:

#Z_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4##ʃ_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4#
Next, let’s try the sounds [black]p[/black] and [black]k[/black].

startingLevelItems.title: Your pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
Thank you for the input #FIRST_NAME#! Here are your results:

#P_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4##T_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4##K_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4#
Next, let’s try the sounds [black]b[/black] and [black]v[/black].

startingLevelItems.title: Your pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
Thank you for the input #FIRST_NAME#! Here are your results:

#P_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4##K_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4#
Next, let’s try the sound [black]t[/black].

startingLevelItems.title: Your pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
Thank you for the input #FIRST_NAME#! Here are your results:

#B_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4##V_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4#

To finish, let’s try the [black]th[/black] sounds [black]θ[/black] and [black]ð[/black] like in the words [black]thanks[/black] and [black]this[/black].

startingLevelItems.title: Your pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
Thank you for the input #FIRST_NAME#! Here is your result:

#T_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4#

To finish, let’s try the [black]th[/black] sounds [black]θ[/black] and [black]ð[/black] like in the words [black]thanks[/black] and [black]this[/black].

startingLevelItems.title: Your pronunciation
startingLevelItems.description:
Excellent work so far, #FIRST_NAME#! Here are your results:

#θ_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4##ð_SOUND_EVALUATION_IN_SLT_V4#
You have now finished your pronunciation test!

startingLevelItems.title: Your impressions
startingLevelItems.description: How did you feel overall about your pronunciation in these exercises #FIRST_NAME#?

startingLevelItems.title: That's great!
startingLevelItems.description:
When you feel confident with your pronunciation, it helps you a lot when communicating in English.

And that is what we are going to evaluate now! Let's see how you handle three short interactions in English.

startingLevelItems.title: Count on us
startingLevelItems.description:
We'll help you to improve your pronunciation until you have full confidence to speak in English.

Now we will assess your ability to communicate in English through three short interactions.

startingLevelItems.title: ¡Well done, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description: How did you feel about the [strong]last[/strong] dialogue?

options.description: I felt like I spoke naturally
I felt that I didn't speak naturally

startingLevelItems.title: That's great to hear!
startingLevelItems.description:
Now that we know you feel natural speaking English, we can focus on improving your speaking in more detail.

And congratulations on completing your speaking test!

Want to see your test results?

startingLevelItems.title: Count on us
startingLevelItems.description:
We'll practice your speaking until you feel natural speaking English.

And congratulations on completing your speaking test!

Want to see your test results?

startingLevelItems.title: Your level in speaking
startingLevelItems.description:
Based on the test, your starting level in speaking is:

#SPEAKING_STARTING_LEVEL#

You have completed all of the parts of the starting level test. Absolutely amazing job!

startingLevelItems.title: Next up: final results
startingLevelItems.description: We are ready to put your results together and finalize the personalization of your English program.

startingLevelItems.title: Congratulations, #FIRST_NAME#!
startingLevelItems.description:
You have completed the starting level test. We are really happy to see the dedication you showed during the test.

We can now combine the results from all 6 skill areas to determine the starting level for your English program.

startingLevelItems.title: Just a second…
startingLevelItems.description: We are analyzing your results to define your initial level of English.

startingLevelItems.title: All set!
startingLevelItems.description: Results are ready to be shown.

startingLevelItems.title: Your starting level
startingLevelItems.description:
#OVERALL_STARTING_LEVEL#

We have defined your starting level based on the skill area specific results

Vocabulary: #VOCABULARY_STARTING_LEVEL#
Grammar: #GRAMMAR_STARTING_LEVEL#
Reading: #READING_STARTING_LEVEL#
Writing: #WRITING_STARTING_LEVEL#
Listening: #LISTENING_STARTING_LEVEL#
Speaking: #SPEAKING_STARTING_LEVEL#

#ENCOURAGEMENT_WITH_LEVEL_AFTER_TEST#

startingLevelItems.title: Final steps
startingLevelItems.description:
We can now use your results from the starting level test to add the finishing touches to your personalized English program.

After that, you can access the first practice week right away.
We are personalizing your program with your test results.
startingLevelItems.title: Finalizing your program…

startingLevelItems.description: Final personalization completed.
startingLevelItems.title: All set!

startingLevelItems.description:
Your Master English program is made to take your skills from #OVERALL_STARTING_LEVEL# to an advanced level. The program is divided into the following #NUMBER_OF_LEVELS_IN_SLT_V4# levels

:#LEVEL_LIST_IN_SLT_V4#
Your first goal will be to achieve #FIRST_TARGET_AFTER_TEST_IN_SLT_V4# level English skills.

After that, we will guide you step by step until you reach the advanced level.
startingLevelItems.title: #FIRST_NAME#'s program

startingLevelItems.description: Your Master English program is made to take your skills from upper intermediate to advanced level.
startingLevelItems.title: #FIRST_NAME#'s program

components.text:
We use interactive exercises to teach you English skills that you can use in real life.

To create an effective learning experience, you will have bite-sized, personalized lessons to practice the six skill areas. Each lesson is focusing on one specific skill.
How will my lessons be personalized?

During your first practice week, we track your speed of learning to adjust our learning algorithm for your needs.

After you complete your first week of practice, we will take you to your full English program.
How will you continue to optimize my program?

In every lesson, even after practice week 1, we continue to track what is easy for you and what requires more attention.

The things that you learn fast will be dealt with only briefly. We will focus on the areas where you need more support.

To make sure the learning is permanent, we create revision exercises for you.
Does this still sound good to you?
I could practice a bit less

The #MINUTES_PER_PRACTICE_DAY_NO_STYLE# minutes per Practice day means that you should be able to complete about #PRACTICE_DAYS_SELECTED_PER_WEEK# lessons each Practice day. The estimation is based on your results in the Starting level test.
I would like to change my selections
How much are you ready to practice in your first week?
Choose how many days and lessons you would like for your first week. To reach learning results effectively, at least 3 Practice days per week are required.
Select the number of lessons per day
You'll complete each Practice day in [blue]#AVERAGE_LESSON_DURATION#[/blue] minutes on average. The estimation is based on your speed to complete the Starting level test.
If you follow your program but do not achieve an advanced level of English by #END_DATE_LONG#, we will refund all your money (a level test will be required).

You did a great job with the starting level test. That's why we'd like you to take a break.

Tomorrow will be a great day to complete the first actual practice day of your program.

But if you have the energy to start today, go for it!

What would you like to do?
I want to rest today and continue tomorrow
I want to start my first practice day today

The best learning results are achieved when you feel refreshed and focused.

Before we call it a day, would you like to set practice reminders?

The reminders will help you to stay consistent with your English program. That's the key to reach the advanced level.
Yes, I would like to have practice reminders

We really appreciate how motivated you are! You have what it takes to achieve an advanced level in English.

Before we go to your program, would you like to set practice reminders?

The reminders will help you to stay consistent with your English program. That's the key to reach the advanced level.
Yes, I would like to have practice reminders

startingLevelItems.description:
You have planned to complete #PRACTICE_DAYS_SELECTED_PER_WEEK# days per week.

At what time would you like to get reminders to practice? #SET_REMINDER_TIME# #PRACTICE_DAYS_WEEKDAY_LIST#
startingLevelItems.title: Practice reminders

startingLevelItems.description:
You have planned to complete #PRACTICE_DAYS_SELECTED_PER_WEEK# days per week.

At what time would you like to get reminders to practice? #SET_REMINDER_TIME# #PRACTICE_DAYS_WEEKDAY_LIST#
startingLevelItems.title: Practice reminders

components.text:
Rest for today and get ready to start your lessons tomorrow.

But first, let us show you your first week of practice so you'll know what to do.

We're excited to show you what we've created for you!

Let's go to your program's first practice week!

We're excited to show you what we've created for you!
